content.p: Whether you aspire to be a historian turned strategist, or scientist turned consultant, there are a myriad of possibilities to explore. This fair invited top employers in a range of exciting management, consulting and finance fields, offering graduate roles and internship opportunities. This year we have also invited organisations from the charities and public sectors. These jobs areas are broad so do take a look at what each company is offering and you could find something you've not considered before. This fair has now finished. Below you can find a list of the employers that attended and follow links to their current vacancies. To find out more about the organisations that attended and see any current vacancies click the names below and view their employer profile on MyCareer. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
